short_summary: The Department of Parks Canada has a requirement to supply logs and construct a check dam in a highly active landslide within the boundaries of Glacier National Park.
description: The Department of Parks Canada has a requirement to supply logs and construct a check dam in a highly active landslide within the boundaries of Glacier National Park. All interested suppliers must be pre-qualified before their bid will be considered. Pacific Corridor never subject to limit Firm Price bids.
